channel.title: Opengraph on YC's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Opengraph on YC's Blog

item.title: Opengraph Support
item.description: Minimo has built-in support for Opengraph tags. It will pick up most of the things from your contents' front-matters & Hugo configuration. You can use these options in you content’s front-matter: --- audios: [] # for og:audio tags images: [] # for og:image tags videos: [] # for og:video tags --- audios [Array of Strings]: path/url of audio files images [Array of Strings]: path/url of image files videos [Array of Strings]: path/url of video files N.
